name: Buddy Bugatti's Tasty Town
description:
Type your way to victory as you face off against three different opponents to become the new heir to Flavor Town!

This game was created for the 2018 Nourishment Jam following the theme "Food".

Team:

Gage O'Connor - Programmer

Zac Mascarenas - Programmer

Vadym Yanchuk - Programmer

Aeron  Degadillo - Programmer / Producer

Eric Moen - Sound Design

Grayson Ducker - Artist
